objects.description: Prikormka contains a module that collects documents with certain extensions from removable media or fixed drives connected via USB.

external_references.description: Cherepanov, A.. (2016, May 17). Operation Groundbait: Analysis of a surveillance toolkit. Retrieved May 18, 2016.
